projects.title: BookList API:
projects.description: Created API in Agile environment which follows CRUD method of operation. Node.js and MongoDB was used for the development and insomnia was used for testing of the API.

projects.title: Weather App:
projects.description: App that allows you to type in the name of any city to then display the weather data. OpenWeather API was used to fetch data.

projects.title: Adventure Game:
projects.description: The adventure game shows a story through which the user is given some options to choose from. If chosen the correct options then the game will finish but if not then it will continue to loop.

projects.title: Social Media Blocker:
projects.description: This is a Google Chrome Extension which blocks social media sites, HTML/CSS animation is used to display a message. JSON was used for creating blocking functionality.

projects.title: Blog Website:
projects.description: Created a blog web application which creates and delete's a blog post and store's that information within a MongoDB database.

projects.title: Disney+ Clone
projects.description: This project is still under development. The clone currently has login functionality, main page, navigation and smooth scroll.
